name: PoKé-Dome
description:
You are a famous Ghostbuster. Your current job is to visit an abandonned mansion, find the ghost haunting it and capturing this supernatural presence before it catches you... or worse?

Don't forget your PoKé-Dome before leaving for your missing, otherwise you will never be able to catch the ghost and finish your job.

And you never know, even if it is an abandonned house, you might find items there to help you reach your goals.

Team: Adrien Balleyguier, Mathieu Buchs, Laurène Borel, Alexandra Wirth et Aurélie Descloux
